name: T·J·琼斯
birth_place: 美国,得克萨斯州,达拉斯
introduction: TJ Jones was born in Dallas, Texas, and grew up in and around Dallas/Ft. Worth, graduating from Midlothian High in Midlothian, Texas. An admitted, 'adventure junkie', he joined the Navy at 18, serving for 11 years. While in the Navy he tried his hand at stand-up comedy, took up skydiving, and worked in radio with AFRTS in McMurdo, Antarctica. After an Honorable discharge, he rode bulls in Texas, was a photographer at Club Med, worked as a marine engineer, and was a switchboarder and photographer for the Mark and Brian Radio program at KLOS in Los Angeles, before making acting his full time career.He works extensively as a Voice Actor, having voiced the audio tour for the Tournament of Roses Post Parade from 2008 - 2011.An avid scuba diver, he once caught a lobster that weighed 13 pounds.
